articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: PCB Unhappy Over Jay Shah's "Shock" Asia Cup Schedule Announcement: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The PCB had organised an event to announce the Asia Cup schedule along with unveiling the trophy on Wednesday, July 19 evening in Lahore. But, ACC president Jay Shah announced the fixtures half an hour before the start of the event.
articles.content: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has expressed its dissatisfaction over BCCI secretary and president of the Asian Cricket Council, Jay Shah announcing the schedule of the upcoming Asia Cup 2023 befor… [+2369 chars]

articles.author: Tara Subramaniam, Mayumi Maruyama
articles.title: US diaspora helps Philippines make World Cup history with country’s first ever appearance - CNN
articles.description: When the Philippines faced off against Switzerland in the New Zealand city of Dunedin on Friday, they became the first team of any gender from the Southeast Asian nation to play at a World Cup.
articles.content:
Auckland, New ZealandCNN
